Description: Identifier (assigned by :ref:`duodata`) of the board of this school.
'Basis Registratie Instellingen-nummer', identifier of the school this branch belongs to. Alphanumeric, four characters long.
In the Netherlands, schools can be based on a (religious [#denomination]_) conviction, which is denoted here.
A COROP area in the Netherlands is a region consisting of several municipalities, and is primarily used by research institutions to present statistical data.
Education areas are aggregations of nodal areas based on regional origins and destinations of students in secondary education.
The name of the municipality this branch is located in.
Identifier (assigned by CBS [#cbs]_) to this municipality.
Area defined for the planning of distribution of secondary schools.
The province [#provinces]_ this branch is situated in.
Year the schools source file was published.
Area that is used for the coordination of school dropouts.
Area defined to cluster information on the labour market.
Cluster of municipalities per collaborating region according to the 'Wet gemeenschappelijke regelingen' [#wgr_law]_.
Date the source file was published at http://data.duo.nl
